content:
Container/Directory Requirements

  • List URL Hierarchy Level. A listing of all entities, along with their media type, and last modified date, which are located at a specific URL hierarchy level in an http URL scheme should be accessible via HTTP, so long as this operation is meaningful.

  • Make URL Hierarchy Level. Via HTTP, it should be possible to create a new URL hierarchy level in an http URL scheme.
